Text.Language: <ere ne w~ ]paryenoc: ]ourw m~m/i n~a~l/yin/: ,ere p~sousou n~te pengenoc: a~rej~vo nan n~Emmanou/l.
Hail to you, O Virgin, / the right and true Queen. / Hail to the pride of our race / who bore to us Immanuel.
